name: regexp for filtering URLs with
description: RegExp code based on StackOverflow question for matching urls with blacklist domains
content:
RegExp code based on StackOverflow question for matching urls with blacklist domains
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/29898092/regexp-for-filtering-urls-with-blacklisted-domains
This RegExp was provided by Mephiztopheles. Thank you. Multiple domains blacklisting added by me.


https://www.facebook.com/list/123456789
http://foo.co.uk/
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OfKc9RIVe7U
http://regexr.com/foo.html?q=bar
http://www.example.com
https://example.com/sdasd
https://www.testdomain.co.uk/
author: konieckropka
